newsitem.title: UK: TENNIS-PIOLINE REACHES THIRD ROUND WITHOUT HITTING A BALL.
newsitem.headline: TENNIS-PIOLINE REACHES THIRD ROUND WITHOUT HITTING A BALL.

text.p: Frenchman Cedric Pioline became the first player to reach the third round of rain-hit Wimbledon on Saturday when his opponent Javier Frana pulled out of the championships with an inner ear infection.
Frana was flying home to Argentina on Saturday, sparing Pioline the boredom facing other Wimbledon players of waiting for the rain to stop before they can begin their second-round matches.
Two washed out days on Thursday and Friday have left the Grand slam event some 260 matches behind schedule.
